item.title: Moved my site to Heroku
item.description: I was thinking about moving to Heroku a few weeks ago. My site has been running on Vultr cheapest plan ($3.5 per month) about half year now. I never had really any issue with Vultr, it just that I don’t use my site that much, and Heroku free tier should be enough for my needs. The process was easier than I thought. I just need to: Register an account. Create an app on Heroku, I can do it directly on their site.
